name: District Administration Office
description: District Administration Office (DAO) - Primary office for citizenship, recommendations, certificates, and district-level administration
descriptionNepali: जिल्ला प्रशासन कार्यालय - नागरिकता, सिफारिस, प्रमाणपत्र र जिल्लास्तरीय प्रशासनको प्राथमिक कार्यालय

name: Land Revenue Office
description: Land Revenue Office (Malpot) - Land registration, ownership transfer, and revenue collection

name: District Education Office
description: District Education Office - SEE/SLC verification, certificate attestation, and educational services

name: Transport Management Office
description: Transport Management Office - Vehicle registration, blue book, route permits
descriptionNepali: यातायात व्यवस्था कार्यालय - सवारी साधन दर्ता, नीलपुस्तिका, रुट अनुमति

name: Driving License Office
description: Driving License Office - License tests, issuance, and renewals

name: Municipality Office
description: Municipality Office (Nagarpalika) - Urban local government services, business tax, building permits
descriptionNepali: नगरपालिका कार्यालय - शहरी स्थानीय सरकारी सेवाहरू, व्यापार कर, भवन अनुमति

name: Rural Municipality Office
description: Rural Municipality Office (Gaupalika) - Rural local government services
descriptionNepali: गाउँपालिका कार्यालय - ग्रामीण स्थानीय सरकारी सेवाहरू

name: Ward Office
description: Ward Office - First point of contact for most services, recommendations, birth/death registration
descriptionNepali: वडा कार्यालय - अधिकांश सेवाहरूको पहिलो सम्पर्क बिन्दु, सिफारिस, जन्म/मृत्यु दर्ता

name: Passport Office
description: Department of Passport - Passport applications, renewals, and MRP issuance
descriptionNepali: राहदानी विभाग - राहदानी आवेदन, नवीकरण र एमआरपी जारी

name: Immigration Office
description: Department of Immigration - Visa services, travel permits, immigration clearance

name: Office of Company Registrar
description: Office of Company Registrar (OCR) - Company registration via e-OCR/CAMIS system

name: Cottage & Small Industry Office
description: District Cottage & Small Industry Office (DCSI) - Small business and cottage industry registration

name: Inland Revenue Office
description: Inland Revenue Office (IRD) - PAN/VAT registration, tax filing, tax clearance

name: Labour Office
description: Labour Office - Foreign employment services, work permits, labor disputes

name: National ID Card Center
description: National ID Card Center - National identity card enrollment and biometric registration
